On August 22, 2025, On August 22, 2025,Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)announced a significant partnership with Google Cloud aimed at accelerating AI-driven innovation for the banking, financial services, and insurance (BFSI) sector .

Gemini Experience Center:A Google Cloud Gemini Experience Center was launched by TCS at its BFSI Innovation Lab in Bengaluru, India.

AI-driven solutions:The collaboration will use Google Cloud's technologies, including Gemini models and Agentspace, combined with TCS's industry expertise to develop "agentic AI" powered solutions.

Industry benefits:Financial institutions will be able to co-create solutions for regulatory compliance, enhanced personalization, and operational efficiency.

Expansion:Following the launch in Bengaluru, the companies intend to expand this offering to other TCS innovation labs and hubs worldwide, starting with TCS Pace Port™ London later in 2025.
